At JackFruit Foundation we believe that...Every child should have access to an education.
Our Mission: Jackfruit Foundation implements social impact projects in schools that contribute to improved quality education, promote equity, and drive innovation.
Our Vision: To improve education across Sub-Saharan Africa by ensuring access to quality learning, sustainable school development, and inclusive education solutions.
At JackFruit Foundation we believe that...Every child should have access to an education.
Our Mission: Jackfruit Foundation implements social impact projects in schools that contribute to improved quality education, promote equity, and drive innovation.
Our Vision: To improve education across Sub-Saharan Africa by ensuring access to quality learning, sustainable school development, and inclusive education solutions.

We know that children learn better when their physical, nutritional, and social needs are met too. So we have hand-picked several organizations to partner with that provide additional support to our schools.

Our Key Focus Areas

Climate Resilience and Green Energy

We promote sustainable practices and green energy solutions in our partner schools, helping them reduce their environmental impact while cutting operational costs. This includes solar power installations, water conservation systems, and environmental education programs.

Key Points:
  1. Developing climate-resilient school infrastructure.
  2. Promoting renewable energy solutions (solar power, energy-efficient lighting).
  3. Supporting environmental education and green school initiatives.

Solar Power Adoption

Water Conservation Impact

Education and Capacity Building

We focus on strengthening educational outcomes through teacher training, curriculum development, and leadership development programs. Our capacity building initiatives ensure sustainable improvement in education quality.

Key Points:
  1. Upskilling teachers through training programs.
  2. Supporting innovative learning methodologies.
  3. Providing school supplies and resources to improve literacy and numeracy.

Teachers Count Progress

Student Count Progress

Tech & Innovation for Social Good

We leverage technology to create innovative solutions for educational challenges. This includes digital learning platforms, data-driven decision making tools, and technology integration in classrooms to enhance learning outcomes.

Key Points:
  1. Implementing AI-driven impact measurement and customized interventions.
  2. Enhancing digital literacy in schools.
  3. Supporting EdTech innovations to improve school operations.

Digital Platform Adoption

Technology Integration by Subject

Gender Equality and Inclusion

We promote equal opportunities in education through targeted programs that support girls' education, female leadership in schools, and inclusive learning environments that cater to diverse needs and backgrounds.

Key Points:
  1. Promoting inclusive education for children with disabilities.
  2. Enhancing digital literacy in schools.
  3. Supporting girls' education initiatives.

Gender Distribution in Leadership

Inclusion Programs Impact
